name: VG_Customer_Order_HO
query:
SELECT so.name AS Order_No, aso.name AS "Approve_VG_No:Link/VG_Approve_Order:50", DATE(so.creation) AS Create_Date, so.order_type AS Order_Type, concat("
image1
") as "Main_Image::100", im.item_name AS Item_Name, bm.branch_short_name AS Branch_Name, CASE WHEN aso.approve = "Approve" THEN 'Approve' WHEN aso.approve = "Check" THEN 'Check' WHEN aso.approve = "Cancel" THEN 'Cancel' WHEN aso.approve = "Sample Pending" THEN 'Sample Pending' ELSE "InProcess" END AS Approve, DATEDIFF(so.delivery_date, CURDATE()) AS Branch_Due_Days, sm.supplier_name AS Supplier, aso.delivery_date AS Order_due_date, DATEDIFF(aso.delivery_date, CURDATE()) AS Due_Days, COUNT(ore.remark) AS Total_followup, MAX(ore.date) AS Last_Followup FROM `tabVG_Customer_Order` so LEFT JOIN `tabItem_Master` im ON im.name = so.prod_name LEFT JOIN `tabBranch_Master` bm ON bm.name = so.branch_name LEFT JOIN `tabVG_Approve_Order` aso ON so.name = aso.order_no LEFT JOIN `tabSupplier_Master` sm ON sm.name = aso.ass_vendor LEFT JOIN `tabVG_Order_Remarks` ore ON ore.parent = aso.name LEFT JOIN `tabVG_Billing_Order` tvbo ON tvbo.order_no = so.name WHERE (aso.vend_remarks IS NULL OR aso.vend_remarks != 'Vendor Follow up Done') AND ( tvbo.order_no ) GROUP BY so.name ORDER BY Due_Days ASC;
